source.title: Indie shooter Escape From Duckov overtakes Battlefield 6 on Steam - Dexerto
source.name: Dexerto

facts: Escape From Duckov has proven to be more popular than Battlefield 6
The player count for Escape From Duckov beat the player count of Battlefield 6 on Steam

neutral.headline: Escape From Duckov surpasses popularity of Battlefield 6 in indie shooter scene
neutral.body_html: The independent video game Escape From Duckov has demonstrated a higher level of player engagement compared to the AAA title, Battlefield 6, on Steam.

conservative.headline: Escape From Duckov outperforms Battlefield 6 in terms of players
conservative.body_html: The indie shooter Escape From Duckov has garnered a higher player count than the AAA game, Battlefield 6, on Steam.

liberal.headline: Escape From Duckov's indie charm outshines Battlefield 6 in gamer community
liberal.body_html: In a surprising turn, the independent shooter Escape From Duckov has captured hearts and players overtaking those of AAA game Battlefield 6, showcasing that indie games can compete with big-budget titles on Steam.
